actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to prohibit commercial flights by supersonic aircraft into or over the United States.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful to operate a supersonic aircraft for a commercial flight in the navigable airspace of the United States until such aircraft meets the noise, environmental, and safety standards already established for other commercial aircraft.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit commercial flights by supersonic aircraft into or over the United States.
